meanings.sent1: I will resummon the courage to face my fears.
meanings.sent2: She resummoned the spirits to help her in times of need.
meanings.sent3: The wizard accidentally resummoned the mischievous goblin.
meanings.sent4: After the storm, the sun resummoned its warm rays to brighten the day.
meanings.sent5: With determination, he resummoned his focus to complete the task.

meanings.sent1: The sorcerer will resummon the magical creatures for another quest.
meanings.sent2: They resummoned the ancient deity to seek guidance.
meanings.sent3: The children jokingly tried to resummon the tooth fairy for extra coins.
meanings.sent4: The melody resummoned memories of a distant summer evening.
meanings.sent5: The ritual resummoned the dormant powers of the enchanted amulet.
